data.actual_result: Canary and PTB builds show the symbol stretched across the whole window: http://prntscr.com/fhq46a
data.expected_result: In the stable version the symbol looks like this: https://prnt.sc/fhpnp7
data.short_description: Raging Demon easter egg 'Japanese Symbol' streched in PTB and Canary but not Stable.
data.steps_to_repro: - Press CTRL + / - Press this sequence "H,H,→,N,K" - Wait for the fireworks - Watch for the symbol at the end
